name: Le Méridien Phuket Mai Khao Beach Resort
address: 81 Moo.3 T.Maikhao A.Thalang, Mai Khao, Phuket City 83110
description: Welcome to Le Méridien Phuket Mai Khao Beach Resort, where relaxed elegance awaits. Our newly opened family-friendly oasis is nestled along the shores of Mai Khao beach, offering a tranquil escape where you can bask in the natural beauty of Phuket. Guests can take their pick from 15 unique rooms and suite types, each with expansive balconies that offer scenic vistas of the pools, sprawling gardens or the Phuket coastline. For an extra touch of indulgence, select accommodations come with private terraces and direct pool access. The resort is conveniently located just a short drive away from Phuket International Airport, ensuring a seamless journey to paradise. Boasting a timeless design that fuses mid-century modern aesthetics with local craftsmanship and natural materials, Le Méridien Phuket Mai Khao Beach Resort offers a relaxed yet sophisticated retreat. From the moment you arrive, you'll be enchanted by the stunning beachfront setting and embraced by the warm hospitality that Phuket is renowned for.Marriott

name: Renaissance Phuket Resort & Spa (SHA Plus+)
description: Indulge yourself at Renaissance Phuket Resort & Spa on Phuket Island, Thailand. Our Phuket beachfront resort offers a variety of on-site restaurants and bars. Sample exquisite Thai cuisine, global comfort food and specialty coffee drinks or sip handcrafted cocktails at our beachfront bar and eatery. Cap off a day at the beach with a rejuvenating massage or wellness treatment at the famous Quan Spa. Maintain your workout at our luxury resort in Phuket's fitness center or swim in our refreshing resort outdoor pool. If you're planning a business, wedding or social gathering in Phuket, host your event in one of our contemporary venues with help from our dedicated planning and catering teams. Retire to a luxury hotel room or beachfront villa that features stylish decor, plush bedding and sleek bathrooms with robes, slippers and deluxe toiletries. Unwind under the warm Phuket sun in tropical resort villas with private plunge pools. Your next great adventure awaits at Renaissance Phuket Resort & Spa.Marriott

name: Patong Merlin Hotel (Sha Plus+)
description: Merlin Hotel is a 5-minute walk from Patong Beach and 1 km from Bangla Road and Jungceylon Shopping Centre. It features 4 outdoor pools, a spa and Thai cooking classes. Patong Merlin Hotel offers modern rooms with a touch of tropical tranquillity. Offering balconies, they come equipped with minibars and tea/coffee makers. En suite bathrooms have toiletries and a hairdryer provided. A fitness centre is available for the health-conscious guest. Alternatively, pampering massage services await. Hotel Merlin has a tour desk that assists with sightseeing arrangements. Asian classics and vegetarian delights can be enjoyed at Coconut Coffee Shop while the outdoor Seaside Garden serves themed buffet dinners. For a relaxing session over drinks, guests can head to Café Del Mar, Sunset Bar or Lobby Lounge.

name: Pullman Phuket Arcadia Karon Beach Resort
description: Pullman Phuket Karon Resort is set in 75 acres of beautiful lush tropical gardens. Set near the Big Buddha and along the golden sands of peaceful Karon Beach, with 8 dining outlets for all tastes, 24 hour fitness center, 3 tennis courts and 2 squash courts for our active guests. With 5 outdoor swimming pools one sporting a water slide for kids, this resort is perfect for families or couples. The large pillar less Grand Ballroom, additional meeting rooms and outside space are perfect for hosting events.accorhotels.com

name: Amatara Welleisure Resort - Sha Extra Plus
description: Amatara Welleisure Resort presents a timelessly fresh, effortlessly Thai and bespoke resort experience, and features one of South-east Asias best ocean-view spa and wellness facilities. With a personality all of its own and benefitting from one of the regions most incredible locations, Amatara Wellness Resort offers an unrivalled way to explore and enjoy Southern Thailand, an endlessly popular and world renowned leisure and tourism destination.iHotelier/iStay

name: Sunwing Kamala Beach (SHA Plus+)
description: Providing a shuttle service to Phuket International Airport, as well as free Wi-Fi, Sunwing Kamala Beach SHA Plus+ is a comfortable place to stay in Kamala. It also provides water slides, a kids club and a swimming pool. The resort offers a garden to unwind in, as well as free public parking on site. It also provides family-friendly facilities, with room layouts and services for families both large and small, plus a kids pool and a playground. The rooms are air conditioned and include a kitchenette, a refrigerator and a private balcony. All provide a flat-screen TV, tea and coffee making facilities and slippers. Guests of Sunwing Kamala Beach SHA Plus+ are welcome to experience European, Asian and Thai cuisine at Som's Kitchen, or try Thai, Asian and European meals at Fino. Sunwing Kamala Beach SHA Plus+ is close to Kamala's well-known attractions, with the Phuket FantaSea only moments on foot from the property. Guests can also visit Kamala Beach.Revato

name: Phuket Marriott Resort & Spa, Merlin Beach (Sha Plus+)
description: Plan a luxury escape to Phuket Marriott Resort & Spa, Merlin Beach. Whether you’re visiting Thailand for a family holiday, couple’s getaway or business trip, our five-star resort in Phuket’s location on the sands of Tri-Trang Beach provides a spectacular backdrop. Stay minutes from the entertainment hub of Patong Beach and Phuket Old Town. Take advantage of family-friendly resort amenities, including a 24 hour fitness center, three pools, children's activities and a day spa. Relax at our swim-up bar and sample delicious cuisine at one of the ten restaurants and bars at our Phuket, Thailand, resort. If you're hosting a meeting, choose from over 8,000 square feet of event space, including poolside and beachside settings and one of the largest ballrooms in Phuket. Unwind in rooms and suites featuring plush bedding, flat-screen TVs, mini-refrigerators, work desks, free Wi-Fi and private balconies with pool, garden, beach or sea views. A sophisticated stay awaits at Phuket Marriott Resort & Spa, Merlin BeachMarriott

name: Marriott's Phuket Beach Club (SHA Plus+)
description: Marriott's Phuket Beach Club welcomes you to Thailand with contemporary comfort and style. Our family-friendly vacation ownership resort is ideal for relaxation, with a great location on Phuket Island and full access to all the luxurious facilities at the adjacent JW Marriott Phuket Resort and Spa. Explore the area from our beachside resort, where we place you minutes from notable attractions and the pristine sands of Mai Khao Beach. Relax with your family by one of the resort pools or break a sweat in the on-site fitness center before spoiling yourself with a spa treatment or drink at the beachfront bar. Satisfy your appetite at our resort's array of restaurants, including a modern steakhouse, Japanese fare and an Italian eatery with pizza delivery. Our spacious two-bedroom apartments feature complimentary Wi-Fi, full kitchens, master suites with soaking tubs, washers, dryers and furnished balconies so you can spread out during your time in Thailand. Your dream getaway awaits at Marriott's Phuket Beach Club.Marriott

name: Four Points by Sheraton Phuket Patong Beach Resort (SHA Plus+)
description: Kick back for a relaxing stay at Four Points by Sheraton Phuket Patong Beach Resort. Just steps from the sea, our Phuket beachfront resort is ideal for couples, friends and families getting away from it all. Enjoy delicious local food and Best Brews™ at our five restaurants and bars or chill out at the Deck Beach Club as your young ones run free at 'Little Sea Gypsies Kids Club' and playground. Host conferences, social events and wedding parties in 1,200 square meters of function space, including two ballrooms and 1,000 square meters of outdoor event space. Themed coffee breaks and cocktail events are paired with a tropical garden with sea views. When the day is done, retreat to one of our 600 modern rooms and suites with direct access to one of three outdoor pools. Leisure travel finds a home at Four Points by Sheraton Phuket Patong Beach Resort, the newest resort in Patong.Marriott

name: Cassia Phuket (Sha Plus+)
description: Cool markets, fresh seafood, Andaman's awesome beaches and a trendy island vibe - all at Cassia Phuket. Get comfy in our fantabulous serviced apartments, each with stylish living and chef-perfect kitchens, daily buffet brekkie, free WIFI and swanky hangou t spots in the resort or beyond laguna complex. Socialise with like-minded global nomads across the world. Come and live the best of both worlds here at Cassia Phuket.accorhotels.com

name: JW Marriott Phuket Resort & Spa (SHA Plus+)
description: Plan an unforgettable escape to our Phuket, Thailand beach hotel. JW Marriott Phuket Resort & Spa is a 5-star, family-friendly resort just steps from Mai Khao Beach. From our beachfront resort in Phuket, Thailand, enjoy easy access to the islands of Phang Nga Bay, Old Town Phuket and the Royal Phuket Marina. Resort guests are treated to an award-winning spa, three outdoor pools, a modern fitness center and activities such as Thai cooking classes. Plan your special occasion in our beachfront hotel in Phuket, Thailand's indoor and outdoor venues with advanced technology, custom catering and dedicated event planners. Relax in family-friendly hotel rooms, suites and villas filled with five-star amenities like plush bedding, marble bathrooms, 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi and outdoor space overlooking tropical gardens or the ocean. Select resort rooms have whirlpool tubs, extra living space and private pools. Create lasting memories at JW Marriott Phuket Resort & Spa in Thailand.Marriott

name: Novotel Phuket Vintage Park Resort
address: 89 Rat U Thit 200 Pee Rd, Patong 83150
description: Novotel Phuket Vintage Park is a 4-star resort featuring contemporary South East Asian architecture and modern facilities. Only a few steps away from shopping centers and Patong's vibrant nightlife, the hotel boasts an all-day dining restaurant, a swim-up bar, a lobby bar, a ballroom dividable into three meeting rooms, a 2,000 m² swimming pool, complimentary WIFI, fitness, and large outdoor car park.accorhotels.com

name: Intercontinental Phuket Resort, An IHG Hotel
address: Moo 3, Kamala Sub-district,Kamala Beach, Phuket City 83150
description: Nestled on the powder-soft sands of Kamala Beach, InterContinental® Phuket Resort is a sleek, sophisticated, and elegant beachside hideaway. The resort is cocooned by jungle-covered hills at one end and offers heavenly views of the Andaman Sea on the other. Enjoy a global culinary adventure at one of our seven themed dining outlets, relax by one of our five stunning swimming pools, welcome bliss at our Sati spa, or just spend the day on a private sunbed listening to the sound of the waves.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Sunsuri Phuket (Sha Plus+)
description: Located in the secluded area of Nai Harn Beach, the property is a 10-minute ride from Rawai Beach and Promthep Cape. Sunsuri Phuket features cosy accommodation with two outdoor pools, purpose built kids pool and kids club. Free WiFi is offered in the entire resort. Set on a hillside, Sunsuri Phuket is a 30-minute drive from Phuket Town and Central Festival Phuket Shopping Centre. Phuket International Airport is a 50-minute ride away. A free scheduled shuttle service to the popular Patong Beach area is available. Beautifully decorated rooms have air conditioning, a cable TV and a private balcony. En suite bathrooms offer free toiletries and slippers. Guests can workout in the fully-equipped gym or relax with pampering massage treatments at the spa. For convenience, the resort offers a 24-hour front desk, meeting facilities and library. The on-site restaurant serves international cuisine, while a variety of drinks can be enjoyed at the wine bar. Room service is available around the clock.
